channel.title: Renegademiners 24/7 SMP [ Economy | PVP Zone | Anti Grief | Survival Games ]
channel.description:
Welcome to Renegade Miners
We are a 24/7 SMP Server with 51 slots, we also have a Pvp map that any user can join "let the battles begin". Our Server is by Fragnet.net, and we run a 99.8% uptime with 2% down for maintance. Our server runs Bukkit with all the major plugins. Our community is very friendly and new user are more than welcome. We dont have any white-lists Owners and Admins are always happy to help, those who have been griefed need only to ask an admin/owner and they will help. We have Hungergames on the server and it is completely automated. We also except donations visit the forums for further information: renegademiners.forumotion.co.uk Also join our Teamspeak: 109.70.149.154:10228 If you dont have it download at www.teamspeak.com
Server Rules
1. You must respect all users,admins and owners on the server. 2. No client hacks/mods this includes: Xray, Zombemod cheats and any form of griefing client but mods such as minimap and optifine are allowed. 3. No rude, racist, sexist or otherwise obscene structures. 4. No excessive Bad language in public chat, this could lead to a kick/ban 5. No asking for materials or items from admins or owners as we are not vending machines. 6. No 1x1 towers, if admins find these they will be removed instantly 7. Build as far away from spawn as possible, this is to avoid getting griefed. 8. If you grief you will be temp/perm banned. 9. Most important rule have fun at all times
Owners
Irishdiablo - Headadmin jebuzjack - Server Dev
Admins
Docred5 Grim_ninja Mr_pink_bob Niceguy36 Sparkyllk Waffles321
Mods Babblewhur Imacookie Tyroneplowes Tertatai_hancur
Our IP: mc.renegademiners.co.uk:26265

item.title: Renegademiners 24/7 SMP [ Economy | PVP Zone | Anti Grief | Survival Games ]
item.dc:creator: @jebuzjack jebuzjack
item.description:
@jebuzjack wrote:

Welcome to Renegade Miners

We are a 24/7 SMP Server with 51 slots, we also have a Pvp map that any user can join “let the battles begin”.
Our Server is by Fragnet.net, and we run a 99.8% uptime with 2% down for maintance. Our server runs Bukkit with all the major plugins. Our community is very friendly and new user are more than welcome. We dont have any white-lists
Owners and Admins are always happy to help, those who have been griefed need only to ask an admin/owner and they will help.
We have Hungergames on the server and it is completely automated. We also except donations visit the forums for further information: renegademiners.forumotion.co.uk
Also join our Teamspeak: 109.70.149.154:10228 If you dont have it download at www.teamspeak.com

Server Rules

  1. You must respect all users,admins and owners on the server.
  2. No client hacks/mods this includes: Xray, Zombemod cheats and any form of griefing client but mods such as minimap and optifine are allowed.
  3. No rude, racist, sexist or otherwise obscene structures.
  4. No excessive Bad language in public chat, this could lead to a kick/ban
  5. No asking for materials or items from admins or owners as we are not vending machines.
  6. No 1x1 towers, if admins find these they will be removed instantly
  7. Build as far away from spawn as possible, this is to avoid getting griefed.
  8. If you grief you will be temp/perm banned.
  9. Most important rule have fun at all times

Owners

Irishdiablo - Headadmin
jebuzjack - Server Dev
